actions.name: Coil Up
actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect:The user's Coil gains [Priority 3] until the start of their next Activation, and the user freely uses Coil.

actions.name: Coil
actions.description: Effect: The user's ATK Stage, DEF Stage and ACC Stage are increased by +1 for 5 activations.

system.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect: Connection - Coil. The user's Coil gains [Priority 3] until the start of their next Activation, and the user freely uses Coil.
